æ§åˆ¶æŒ‡ä»¤

å¸¸ç”¨è¿ç»´SQL

-- æŸ¥çœ‹æ•°æ®åº“å¯åŠ¨æ—¶é•¿
SELECT date_trunc('second', current_timestamp - pg_postmaster_start_time()) as uptime;

-- å½“å‰æ•°æ®åº“**è¡¨**å ç”¨çš„ç¡¬ç›˜ç©ºé—´
-- å…¶ä»–æ•°æ®åº“å°†current_database()æ¢ä¸ºæ•°æ®åº“å
SELECT pg_size_pretty(pg_database_size(current_database()));

-- æŒ‡å®šè¡¨å’Œç´¢å¼•ç©ºé—´
-- ref: https://pgpedia.info/p/pg_total_relation_size.html

-- è¸¢å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰æŒ‡å®šæ•°æ®åº“çš„è¿æ¥
SELECT pg_terminate_backend (pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE datname = 'db';

-- æ•°æ®é‡å‘½åï¼ˆéœ€è¦å…ˆæ–­å¼€ä¸è¯¥åº“çš„è¿æ¥ï¼‰
ALTER DATABASE db RENAME TO newdb;

ç”¨æˆ·ä¸æƒé™

-- å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·
select * from current_user;
-- or
select user;

-- æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·
SELECT usename FROM pg_user;

-- åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
CREATE USER tehaochi_u WITH PASSWORD 'your password';

-- æˆæƒ
-- åº“æƒé™
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE tehaochi TO tehaochi_u;
-- è¡¨æƒé™ï¼ˆä¸“å®¶çº§åˆ«åœ¨ç”¨ï¼‰
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON tablename TO username_u;

-- åˆ·æ–°ç”¨æˆ·æƒé™
ALTER USER tehaochi_u;

-- åŠé”€ç”¨æˆ·æƒé™ï¼Œåˆ é™¤ä¹‹å‰æ¯”éœ€è¦åšã€‚
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE tehaochi FROM tehaochi_u;
DROP USER tehaochi_u;
-- å¦‚æœç”¨æˆ·åœ¨çº¿ï¼Œå¿…é¡»è¸¢å‡º
SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pg_stat_activity.pid)
    FROM pg_stat_activity
    WHERE pg_stat_activity.usename = 'tehaochi';
